awards.text: Nominated for 1 Primetime Emmy. Another 4 nominations.

fullplot: Thornton Wilder's classic play on Grover's Corners, a fictional small town and its story taking place between 1901 and 1913, dealing with themes as life, death and the everyday routine of its many residents, all followed and detailed by the Stage Manager.

title: Our Town
